title: Matt Cardle, Melanie C - Loving You[1080p x264]-BFAB-[P2PDL]
description:
"Loving You" is a single by English recording artist Matt Cardle, the song is a duet with Melanie C. It was produced by Cardle with Jamie Scott and Toby Smith and features Cardle on drums and guitar.The single was released on 18 August 2013 in the United Kingdom as a digital download as the lead single from his third studio album Porcelain (2013). It has also been released in Europe, South America and North America, making it the first of his singles to be released outside the United Kingdom and Ireland. Despite only BBC Radio 2 playlisiting the song, which meant a lack of airplay on radio overall, it performed well in the charts.It reached number 14 on the UK Singles Chart, making it Matt Cardle's third UK Top 40 single. It also reached number 42 on the Irish Singles Chart and number 11 in Scotland.Directed by Jonny Kight, the music video was filmed in south London, England on 4 July 2013.It premiered on Vevo on 21 July 2013. The video starts with Cardle sitting on his own in various rooms of a house. Mel C is revealed, also on her own, after the first chorus for her solo verse. Throughout, there are close up shots of their bodies laying together on a mattress, apart at first then becoming closer together until finally kissing at the end. The video received media attention due to the singers kissing in the video.
